title: What is your views on Share Chat Mobile App? - Quora

response.answer_text: sharechat app Indians first social sharing app. you can share video , audio, images and GIF. you can follow your friends but you cannot chat from this app. you easily share videos, images, audio with your friends through whatsapp. You can download sharechat app directly from Google play store: ShareChat - Make friends, WhatsApp Status & Videos - Apps on Google Play  Please Follow me for more such interesting and correct answers :)
